Class Showtime

  • java.lang.Object
    • Showtime

  • public class Showtime
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Lloyd

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Showtime(Cinema cinema, int movieId, java.util.Date session, java.util.List<Ticket> tickets)
      This creates a showtime for the movieId passed in, including the date, type of tickets and creation of seats.

      • Showtime

        public Showtime(Cinema cinema,
                int movieId,
                java.util.Date session,
                java.util.List<Ticket> tickets)
        This creates a showtime for the movieId passed in, including the date, type of tickets and creation of seats.
        Parameters:
        cinema - The cinema that the showtime is at
        movieId - the movieId of the movie for that showtime
        session - The date and time of the showtime
        tickets - The tickets availiable for booking at that showtime
